Title: Saipem, Subsea 7 sign merger to create Saipem 7
Description: Italian oilfield services firm Saipem and UK’s offshore project contractor Subsea 7 have announced a merger agreement, creating a global leader in energy services.
Author: JS

Title: Damage detected at Japan's Takahama 4 nuclear reactor, restart timing uncertain
Description: Japanese power utility Kansai Electric has discovered wall thinning and possible cracking in steam generator tubes at its 870 MW Takahama Unit 4 nuclear reactor during scheduled maintenance, raising questions about its planned late October restart.
Author: CK

Title: Golden Pass LNG gets partial in-service authorization for pipeline interconnect facility ahead of startup
Description: The 18 mtpa Golden Pass LNG project in Sabine Pass, Texas, has received federal approval to place its pipeline interconnect facility into partial service, connecting the terminal to the Natural Gas Pipeline Company of America system and marking further progress in commissioning ahead of the project’s anticipated startup by year-end.
Author: CK
